name: Just Highlight
author: Sigalitam

sections.description:
Just highlight is a WordPress plugin for highlighting text in your posts or pages, and easily create beautiful posts that highlight what really matters to your readers.

How to use?
* Select the sentence you want to highlight with the cursor.
* Click the Just Highlight button at the top of the post editor.
* Save the post.
* View the post and be amazed from the animation of the highlight as you scroll down the post.

You can also:
* Choose the text highlight background color.
* Choose the highlight speed animation (Slow, Normal, Fast, Very Fast).
* Choose YES / NO to activate or disable the highlight animation.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip and upload the “just-highlight” folder to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin in the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Just Highlight settings page.
  4. Start Highlighting!
sections.faq:
Can I change the color and the speed of the animation?

Yes, please go to your WordPress admin and go to the Just Highlight setting page.

Is this plugin compatible with Gutenberg?

Yes, it is compatible to Gutenberg, and the WYSIWYG editor.

Is this plugin compatible with the WordPress classic editor?

Yes, it is compatible to WordPress classic editor.

Is this plugin support Elementor?

Unfortunately this plugin doesn’t Elementor.
